name: HopBop
description:
HopBop is a platformer made in the Ursina Engine! its a simple platformer with 10 simple levels. great to play to let off some steam!

But if you want a bit of competitiveness feel free to speed run through the game and post your time in the comments below!

this game was made in a week and all feedback is welcome, like my other games so far its me trying to expand my skills and knowledge as a game dev!

feel free to report any bugs you find :)

all the music and sounds are made by me,

Ursina engine: https://www.ursinaengine.org/
